message: Let's split it evenly to get it over with!
You're being too generous, I'll take this!
You're not getting away with all the money!
You're getting desperate, I'll take the majority!
You're not getting the majority, but I'm willing to give you a decent share!
You're not getting any more generous, I'll take the lion's share!
I'm trying to find a middle ground, meet me in the middle!
You're getting close to the end, I'll take the final bite!
I'm making a final push, meet me halfway!
You're running out of time, take the scraps!
I'm making a last-ditch effort, take the majority!
This is my last chance, take it or leave it!
